Features

  • 13MP primary camera with auto focus and 5MP front facing camera.
  • 13.97 centimeters (5.5-inch) HD IPS capacitive touchscreen with 1280 X 720 pixels resolution and 267 ppi pixel density.
  • Android 6.0+CoolUI operating system (Upgradable to TBC) with 1.4GHz MSM8929 Chipset Qualcomm octa core processor, 3GB RAM, 32GB internal memory expandable up to 32GB and dual SIM (micro+micro) dual-standby (4G+4G).
  • 2500mAH lithium-ion battery providing talk-time of 8 hours and standby time of 150 hours.
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase.
